Hong  - 743P: Combined analysis of overall survival (OS) from the phase 3 CodeBreaK 300 and phase 1b CodeBreaK 101 studies of sotorasib 960 mg plus panitumumab (soto960+pani) therapy for chemorefractory KRAS G12C-mutated metastatic colorectal cancer (mCRC) (10/19/2025, 12-13:00, Hall 25)
